entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Provide a per-user option to ignore TreatWarningsAsErrors #68196
  • System.InvalidOperationException: Unexpected value 'PropertyAccess' of type 'Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.VisualBasic.BoundKind' #68194
  • Remove Unused References does not work for .NET Standard 2.0 project although it uses the new csproj format #68189
  • Intellisense "contains" not working fine! #68188
    17.7

Closed

  • Need Feature/AB flag for Document-Outline. #68192
  • Rename UI: highlighting span doesn't shrink when the new name is shorter #65299
    17.5
  • Formatted output is lexically different from the input. #68187
  • Retrieving new line formatting option #68185
  • UI/interaction issues still present in Document Outline. #67264
    Next
  • Document Outline VS2022 17.4 show "hard to watch" tree node when member's class are inline #66473
    Next
  • Enums don't nest in Document Outline depending on formatting #66012
    Next
  • the tree-view resets to the top whenever the model is updated, making is so you lose your place in the tree. #68103
    Next
  • As you navigate in a file, the selected item in the view will be updated, but will not scroll into view. So finding that item is extremely challenging (in large files). #68102
    Next
  • Sort state is not preserved across VS sessions. #68100
    Next
  • SearchBar lacks history, as well as normal `x` adornment to clear the search #68098
    Next
  • Sort buttons do not show their state, making it unclear what the current sorting state is #68096
    Next
  • Document Outline for C#: selected sort is lost when switching document #63859
    Next
  • Deprecate CompilationWithAnalyzers.IsDiagnosticAnalyzerSuppressed public API #67592

PullRequests

Created

  • Initial support for dictionary collection literals #68197
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Validate InlineArrayAttribute applications on types in source. #68195
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Draft "Use net8.0 runtime for InlineArray tests" #68190
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Update interceptors branch from latest main #68182
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Enable document outline by default #68088
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Only do LOC for 17.6 #68181
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement compile-time boundary checks around inline arrays access. #68178
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Avoid waiting on the thread pool when there is no work to do #68106
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Next
  • Update compiler tool set version in 17.5 #68180
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix detection of nested symbols in Document Outline #68107
    Area-IDE, IDE-Navigation, Navigation-Document Outline, Next
  • Use a proper tool bar in Document Outline #68094
    Area-IDE, IDE-Navigation, Navigation-Document Outline, Next
  • Avoid waiting on the thread pool when there is no work to do #68114
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Next
  • Deprecate CompilationWithAnalyzers.IsDiagnosticAnalyzerSuppressed public API #67671
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Performance-Scenario-Diagnostics, Next

Updated

  • Sync C# required members implementation with VB changes #68200
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to release/dev17.6-vs-deps #68199
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.5-vs-deps #68198
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Enabled .NET remote host by default #68161
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Pack bits in SourceOrdinaryMethodSymbol into an existing bitflag structure we have for all source methods #68158
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add feature to help people move to using primary constructors. #68147
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix 'ctor' snippet in nested class #68177
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Reuse member names collection in decl tree across edits #67753
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add and emit ref kind for ref readonly parameters #68179
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add FilterTree/FilterSpan API on remaining analysis contexts #68052
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Performance-Scenario-Diagnostics
  • Implement member lookup for extension types #68137
    Area-Compilers, C# 12.0
  • Allow `ref readonly` modifier #68164
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0
